diff_hunk:

 #define LOG(severity) _TF_LOG_##severity

body_html:
for binary size reasons, I think it's preferable on mobile devices to not include vlog support. So can you include somthing like:

#ifdef IS_MOBILE_PLATFORM
/// old VLOG_IS_ON code
#else
// new VLOG_IS_ON code
#endif
